Uses of Interface
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.Extension

Packages that use Extension
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.bml Provides BML extensions.  
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.exporter Provides interfaces for development of document export extensions.  
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.importer Provides interfaces for development of document import extensions.  
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.tool Provides interfaces for development of extensions that enable invocation of external tools.  
com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.xsl Provides XSL extensions.  
 

Uses of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.bml
 

Classes in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.bml that implement Extension
 class BMLExporter
          An extension to Xeena that exports a simple BML document into a Java class that implements an application resulting from the BML description.
 class BMLImporter
          An extension to Xeena that imports a Java bean (from a Java class on the classpath) into a simple BML document.
 class BMLPlayer
          An extension to Xeena that implements a BML player.
 

Uses of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.exporter
 

Subinterfaces of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.exporter
 interface XMLExporter
          This interface defines the methods a document exporter should implement.
 

Uses of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.importer
 

Subinterfaces of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.importer
 interface XMLImporter
          This interface defines the methods a document importer should implement.
 

Uses of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.tool
 

Subinterfaces of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.tool
 interface ToolHandler
          This interface defines the methods any general Tool Handler should implement.
 

Uses of Extension in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.xsl
 

Classes in com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.xsl that implement Extension
 class XSLHandler
          An extension to Xeena that implements an XSL Processor.
